summary: Basil is a popular herb used in cooking around the world. It's a soft plant that grows in tropical places like Africa and Southeast Asia. There are many types of basil, such as sweet basil and Thai basil. You can find it in different flavors too, like lemon basil. In places with hot weather, basil can live for more than one year, but in cooler areas, it's usually an annual plant. People often use basil in Italian dishes, but it's also great in many other cuisines.
title: Basil
